AppTheme.AppClosingText: Please wait, the application is shutting down
AppTheme.Title: PCCAM
AppTheme.OfflineActivationReadmeFileText: 오프라인 활성화 웹 서버(https://www.activationservice.net)에서 활성화 요청 파일(.req)과 라이선스 파일(.lic)로 오프라인 활성화 라이선스 파일(.act)을 생성합니다. 자세한 방법은 도움말 웹 서버(https://doc.pccam.site)를 참고하세요.

Options.Name: 옵션
Options.DynamicRtspPortTooltip: Automatically select free port for RTSP communication
Options.UseRandomMacForExtraInstancesTooltip: Generate random MAC address for extra cameras in Multiple Cameras mode
Options.FactoryResetTooltip: Reset all settings to factory defaults
Options.AudioConnectByDevicePathTooltip: If selected, the software will connect to Mic source using device path, otherwise - by Name
Options.EnableCompatibilityModeTooltip: Enable ONVIF compatibility mode for buggy NVR/VMS clients
Options.EnableBuggyVmsTricksTooltip: Enable special tricks to ensure compatibility with exacqVision, Avigilon VMS and Milestone XProtect
Options.AllowMFSoftwareEncoderTooltip: Allow MF fallback to SW encoder (not recommended)
Options.IsHiddenModeTooltip: When enabled the App will not show icon in Windows tray. Use Ctr+Alt+d combination to open the App window
Options.EnableTVTCompatibilityTooltip: Enable 'Compatibility mode' and 'SOAP tricks' to support TVT NVR/ED NVR/Easterncctv
Options.IsCtrlAltDEnabledTooltip: Display application window when Ctrl+Alt+d hotkey pressed
Options.AudioUseWasapiTooltip: Use Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI) for audio
Options.RtspUrlNamingForScreenTooltip: The way how software names RTSP urls for Screen sources
Options.RtspUrlNamingForWebcamTooltip: The way how software names RTSP urls for Webcam sources

CameraSettings.Name: 카메라 설정
CameraSettings.UsePort80Tooltip: 기본 포트 대신 80포트를 사용하며 다중 카메라 방식에서는 허용되지 않음.
CameraSettings.PreventIdleTooltip: 카메라가 실행되는 동안 윈도우가 절전모드로 전환되는 것을 방지
CameraSettings.EnableEventsTooltip: Produce ONVIF monion events when mouse or keyboard used
CameraSettings.BandwidthLowTooltip: Network Bandwidth is not enough for the current bitrate. Please decrease cameras bitrate or improve Network speed
CameraSettings.RdpSafeDisconnectTooltip: Disconnect the current RDP session and keep live streaming

VideoAudioSettings.Name: 비디오 및 오디오 설정
VideoAudioSettings.StopCameraWarningText: 비디오 및 오디오를 설정하려면 카메라를 정지해야 함.
VideoAudioSettings.AutoModeTooltip: Automatically adjust encoding Bitrate and GOV Length
VideoAudioSettings.FinishTestText: Live video and audio should be displaying now. Press OK to finish
VideoAudioSettings.FpsForceTooltip: Manual FPS value (recommended range - 3...15). Actual FPS may be lower

AddCustomInputSource.Name: 미디어 추가
AddCustomInputSource.InputSourceNameTooltip: Name for the external Media Source (up to 10 symbols)
AddCustomInputSource.UrlTooltip: URL to the external Media Source
AddCustomInputSource.CredentialsTooltip: Username and password of the external Media Source
AddCustomInputSource.EncTooltip: Encoding of the external Media Source video stream
AddCustomInputSource.EnableRtcpToolTip: Use RTCP packets, disable it if the stream periodically disconnects
AddCustomInputSource.EnableKeepAliveToolTip: Enable RTSP keep alive packets, disable it for old incompatible RTSP servers
AddCustomInputSource.ResolutionTooltip: Resolution and FPS of the external Media Source video stream
AddCustomInputSource.IpAddressPortTooltip: Host Address and Port of the external Media Source
AddCustomInputSource.PasswordTooltip: Password of the External VNC server
AddCustomInputSource.XYPointsTooltip: X and Y coordinates of the screen area
AddCustomInputSource.WidthHeightTooltip: Width and Height of the screen area
AddCustomInputSource.ValidateButtonTooltip: Validate connection to the external Media Source
AddCustomInputSource.ValidateMessageText: Video from the External Media Source should be displaying now. Press OK to finish
AddCustomInputSource.HttpsNotSupportedMesssage: Connecting via HTTPS is not supported currently. Please use HTTP
AddCustomInputSource.NoVideoSourceLine2Text:
Use it for creating Audio(Mic) only streams.
IMPORTANT: RTSP clients only. Most probably VMS/NVR would not be able to use this stream via ONVIF
AddCustomInputSource.MixerSourceTooltip: Combine multiple video sources into a single media
AddCustomInputSource.Media1Tooltip: Specify Media1 for the combined Media Source
AddCustomInputSource.Media2Tooltip: Specify Media2 for the combined Media Source
AddCustomInputSource.Media3Tooltip: Specify Media3 for the combined Media Source
AddCustomInputSource.Media4Tooltip: Specify Media4 for the combined Media Source
AddCustomInputSource.PicPositionTooltip: Select the position of the overlay media
AddCustomInputSource.PicSizeTooltip: Specify the Size of the overlay media
AddCustomInputSource.WallResolutionTooltip: Desired resolution of the Wall media
AddCustomInputSource.WallMaxFpsTooltip: Maximum possible FPS. Depends on the Wall Resolution and attached Video Sources capabilities

LicenseInformation.Name: 라이선스 정보
LicenseInformation.UseLicenseServerTooltip: Import from a Local License server
LicenseInformation.LicenseServerUrlTooltip: Specify Local License server URL (E.g http://192.168.1.2:8088 )

About.Name: About
About.ThirdPartySoftwareText: *PCCAM includes computer software supplied by third-parties.

StartedCameraInfo.Name: 카메라 정보
StartedCameraInfo.VideoSourceOriginalResolutionTooltip: Connection mode to the Video Source
StartedCameraInfo.HwAcceleratedStreamNameTooltip: Name of High performance, Hardware accelerated stream
StartedCameraInfo.StreamBitrateTooltip: Current bitrate limit of the stream
StartedCameraInfo.CopyRtspButtonTooltip: Copy direct RTSP URL to clipboard
StartedCameraInfo.NoTranscodingTooltip: Native stream from the source (not transcoded)
StartedCameraInfo.PreviewMediaText: Media should be displaying now. Press OK to finish

ConfigureController.Name: Configure controller
ConfigureController.NvrControlTooltip: Allow NVR/VMS clients manage streaming parameters (Enable is recommended)
ConfigureController.BitrateTooltip: Current bitrate limit of the stream
ConfigureController.NoVideoNoAudioSourcesText: There are no assigned Video or Audio sources
ConfigureController.TooHighFpsTooltip: FPS value too high. Current environment may not support this FPS rate (please test before use)
ConfigureController.WebcamCaptureModeTooltip: The Connection Mode to the source device

ConfigureOverlay.Name: Configure overlay
ConfigureOverlay.CustomTextTooltip: Enable or Disable User text overlay

ConfigureMotion.Name: Configure motion
ConfigureMotion.KeyboardTooltip: Enable or Disable ONVIF Motion event on Keyboard press
ConfigureMotion.MouseClickTooltip: Enable or Disable ONVIF Motion event on Mouse click
ConfigureMotion.MouseMovementTooltip: Enable or Disable ONVIF Motion event on Mouse move
ConfigureMotion.KeyboardAllKeysTooltip: Generate Motion event if any key pressed
ConfigureMotion.KeyboardSpecificKeyTooltip: Generate Motion event if a specific key pressed
ConfigureMotion.ApiTooltip: Trigger motion events from extrarnal applications via Application Programming Interface (API)
ConfigureMotion.VideoSourceTokenTooltip: Token parameter, needed for the API call

Messages.CantStartCamera: Cannot start camera. Check log file for more details
Messages.CriticalError: PCCAM encountered a critical exception. Please restart the application. We are sorry for the inconvenience
Messages.ConfirmActivation: Activation will tie the license to this PC. Continue?
Messages.NewPasswordNotConfirmed: New password and confirm password are not same
Messages.ConfirmDeleteLicense: Are you sure you want to delete current License?
Messages.OtherInstanceStarted: Another instance of the application is already running.
Messages.ConfirmExit: You are about to stop Camera and exit the application. Continue?
Messages.SSLError: A PC doesn't accept License Server SSL certificate. Restart a computer and try again. Please contact support if this error persists
Messages.FactoryResetConfirmation: Camera settings will be restored to factory defaults. External Media sources will be removed. Continue?
Messages.FactoryResetCompleted: All settings has been restored to factory defaults
Messages.NoIPAddressesDetected: Can't retreive IP addresses. The software will use PC hostname instead
Messages.UniqueNameRequired: Please specify a unique name for custom Input Source. The Name '{0}' is already in use
Messages.ConfirmRemoveMediaSource: Media source '{0}' will be removed. Continue?
Messages.CancelProxyLicenseServerRequest: Cancel importing license from a Local License server ?
Messages.ConfirmResetToDefaultsAction: This action will reset streaming configuration to defaults. Continue?
Messages.ControllerTypeChangeConflictScreen: You can have only single '{0}' controller per physical screen. The controller is currently in use by '{1}' media source
Messages.ConfirmLockNvrChange: NVR/VMS clients will not be able to manage streaming parameters. That may cause compatibility issues. Continue?
Messages.ConfirmUsingH265: H265 stream would not work with ONVIF. Use H265 only for direct RTSP connections. Continue?
Messages.AudioCpuUsageWarning: Using Audio might noticeable increase CPU usage. Test before applying
